pr_title: Fix/implement adm message handler job base

timeline.message: adding amazon api_key and updating the signing debug keystore
Updating dev app AndroidManifest to support Amazon

timeline.author: Jeasmine
Jeasmine

replies.bodyText:
Don't need to log the catch as it is expected to throw on older FireOS devices everytime.
Logging ADMLatestAvailable after words as DEBUG would be a good idea though.
replies.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText: if the number is the job id, can you make it a constant? usually, ids started with a number to identify the job type, for example for intents we use 100x, 200x, or 10x, 20x, for this ADM we could use 3000? just to have a convention regarding all ADM to start with 300.
timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText:
I agree on making this a constant.
We don't want to use something like 3000 as this is something an app developer might pick for something else. The value 123891 is fine, we want to make sure it is unique.
replies.author: jkasten2

timeline.message: logging adm latest available and code style changes
